Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Allows for the examination of industrial development agencies and not-for-profit corporations by county comptrollers
Summary: Allows for the examination of projects and/or actions by industrial development agencies and not-for-profit corporations by county comptrollers.
LawCode: Add ยง34-b, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to allowing for the examination of industrial development agencies and not-for-profit corporations by county comptrollers
